Comment in SQL Worksheet
Note:
  -guidance @
    -https://community.snowflake.com/s/article/how-to-comment-or-uncomment-multiple-lines-in-the-sql-worksheet
Main Succcess Scenario:
  1. Comment single line 
    // my commented text on one line 
Alternatives:
  1a. Comment multiple lines 
    1a1. see below 
      // line 1
      // line 2
      // line 3
